channel.title: Compiller error
channel.description:
When i compile i get this error [code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options[/code]
im using richscape source and the compiler im using is
[code]@echo off title YOURSERVER Compiler "C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
any one know whats wrong?

item.title: Compiller error
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

Well I don’t know what the error is trying to say.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiller error
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

o so i need the original one that came with ur server? can u post it on here :s

Read full topic

item.title: Compiller error
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The source files are located in a directory, so the normal compiler you may use for other sources won’t work with it. You need to configure it to work like the original batch files that came with the source did.

Read full topic
